allow_missing.description: This should always be set to true for Settings API. Added for AIP compliance.

field_mask.description:
Field mask is required to be passed into the PATCH request. Field mask specifies which fields
of the setting payload will be updated.
The field mask needs to be supplied as single string. To specify multiple fields in the field mask,
use comma as the separator (no space).

requestBody.description: Details required to update a setting.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

409.description: Request was rejected due a conflict with an existing resource.

patch.description: Updates the enhanced security monitoring setting for the workspace. A fresh etag needs to be provided in
